title: 1916 silent film intertitle
content:
Here's an intertitle from one of the "Mishaps of Musty Suffer" films released in 1916-17, complete with a misspelling. What typeface is this, and what contemporary font would I use to match this? I have a couple that are sort of close, but I'd like to get this exactly right. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150129054614im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Musty-intertitle_4535.jpeg)
author: silentcinema
